data.title: Obituary for Charles Taormina
data.meta_description: Charles Taormina | Passed away on Feb 11, 2024 | Charles Taormina, passed away at Hilltop Heights on...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Charles Taormina | Duca Funeral Home
data.text:
Charles Taormina, passed away at Hilltop Heights on February 11, 2024.

Born December 5, 1942, in Johnstown to Giovanni and Josephine (Adamese) Taormina. Preceded in death by parents, siblings, John, Lucia, Julius, and Michael. Survived by numerous nieces, nephews, and friends.

Charles was a member of St. Francis Church and was a former member of the Knights of Columbus.

At the request of the deceased, he will be interred at St. Anthonyâ€™s Cemetery at a future date.
